description:
The threshold for asking yourself "is it worth taking a bowl?" just got a lot lower. Sea to Summit’s X line pairs supple food-grade silicone with food-safe nylon to create a collapsible bowl that's a viable option for gram-counters.

  • Easy-to-pack collapsible design
  • Supple food-grade silicone doesn’t transfer taste, resists high heat, and is easy to clean
  • Cut-resistant nylon base provides a stable foundation
  • Works as an excellent collapsible dog bowl
  • Microwave and dishwasher safe
  • Dimensions: collapsed 12.5 x 1.5cm, open 12.5 x 5.5cm
name: Sea To Summit XBowl
